SA15n1232:11: dharmavacanenāpi parāśrayatvād dharmasya dharmyāśrayasiddhau pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmiṇa eva siddhiriti cet | na |
SA15n1232:14: siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve punardharmiṇo vacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturiti niyamārthamāśaṃkyeta |
SA15n1232:15: dṛṣṭaṃ sajātīya eva sattvam ityavadhāraṇena sādhyābhāve siddhe'pi vyatireke sādhyābhāve asattvavacanam,
SA15n1232:16: tathehāpi tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt siddhe'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve tatraiva bhāvaniyamārtha dharmivacanamāśaṃkyeta |
SA15n1232:17: tasmāt sāmarthyād arthapratītāvapi upacāramātrāt samānanirdeśāt pratipattigauravaṃ ca parihṛtaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1232:25: (1.4) tasya vyāptirhi vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva |
SA15n1232:27: etena anvayo vyatireko vā pakṣadharmaśca yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścita uktaḥ |
SA15n1232:30: (1.5) tatra pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi pratyakṣato'numānato vā prasiddhiḥ |
SA15n1232:33: sadhūmaṃ hi pradeśamarthāntaraviviktarūpamasādhāraṇātmanā dṛṣṭavataḥ smārtaṃ yathādṛṣṭabheda viṣayaṃ liṅgajñānamutpadyate |
SA15n1232:35: (1.6) tasmiṃstathābhūte darśanena dṛṣṭesati sa yena yenāsādhāraṇastadasādhāraṇatāṃ tato bhedamabhilapantī atadvayāvṛtiviṣayā smṛtirutpatrā pratyakṣabalena na pramāṇam |
SA15n1232:40: arthakriyārthī hi sarvaḥ prekṣāvān pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vā'nveṣate |
SA15n1232:41: na ca sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇapratipatterūrdhvaṃ tatsāmarthyotpatravikalpavijñānagrāhyaṃ kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayati |
SA15n1232:45: na ca tatsvalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyārthakriyā kriyate |
SA15n1232:46: (1.7) tasmāt anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam ityapi anadhigate svalakṣaṇe iti viśeṣaṇīyam |
SA15n1232:47: adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpastadanukārī kāryatastadviṣayatvāt smṛtireva,
SA15n1232:53: tato'pi vikalpāt vastunyeva tadadhyavasāyena puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ |
SA15n1232:55: pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇena abhinnayogakṣematvāduttareṣāṃ kvacidaprāmāṇyaprasaṅga iti cet | na |
SA15n1232:58: sādhāraṇe hi kārye na teṣāṃ sāmarthyabhedaḥ |
SA15n1232:67: satsu apyanyeṣu hetuṣu asyābhāve na bhavatīti yastadbhāve bhāvastadabhāve'bhāvaśca pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tasya siddhiḥ |
SA15n1232:68: kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hyarthāntarasya evaṃ syāt- yatra dhūmastatrāvaśyamagniriti,
SA15n1232:69: agnibhāva eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tatkāryatvamiti |
SA15n1232:72: (1.9) vyatirekaniścayo'pi kāryasvabhāvahetvoḥ kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhibhyāṃ dṛśyaviṣayābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇavyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ sādhyābhāve'bhāvasiddhiruddiṣṭa viṣayasyābhāvopadarśane |
SA15n1232:74: anuddiṣṭaviṣayaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpanaṃ pratibandhamātrasiddhau sidhyatīti na tatra vyatireka- sādhane anupalabdhyoḥ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate |
SA15n1232:85: aparāparavyāvṛttibhedena dharmabhede satyapi vastutaḥ liṅgasvabhāva eva |
SA15n1232:86: hetusvabhāve sādhyadharme'nvayavyabhicārābhāvāt lakṣaṇe tanmātrānvayeneti viśeṣaṇaṃ paramatāpekṣam |
SA15n1232:88: tena ca viśeṣaṇena tathavidhasya atatsvabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetorvyabhicāraṃ cāha |
SA15n1232:92: yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam |
SA15n1232:95: tathā, kṣaṇikatvābhāve sattvābhāvaḥ saṃśca śabda iti |
SA15n1232:97: (2.3) atra pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrasāmarthyādeva pratijñārthasya pratīteḥ na pratijñāyāḥ prayoga upadarśitaḥ |
SA15n1232:100: pradeśasthaṃ dhūmamupalabdhavataḥ tasyāgninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tatsāmarthyādeva agniratra iti pratijñārthapratītirbhavati |
SA15n1232:101: na ca tatra kaścit agniratreti asmai nivedayati |
SA15n1232:103: pramāṇamantareṇaivaṃ pratīteḥ nimittābhāvāt pratītau liṅgasya vaiyarthyam |
SA15n1232:104: svayamevākasmāt agniratreti vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye paścālliṅgamanusaratīti ko'yaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ?
SA15n1232:108: yadi pratītiranyathā na syāttadā sarvaṃ śobheta |
SA15n1232:109: tasmādeṣa svayaṃpratītau kenacid viṣayopasthāpakena vināpi pratiyan asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate |
SA15n1232:110: asmadvacanādapi svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyetīti ko'nayoravasthayorviśeṣaḥ?
SA15n1232:111: dṛṣṭā ca pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrāt sādharmyavat - prayogādeḥ pratijñāvacanamantareṇāpi pratītiriti kastasyopayogaḥ?
SA15n1232:113: tatra svayaṃ prameyopadarśanena vināpi pratipadya paraṃ pratipādayatrapūrva kramamāśrayate iti kimatra kāraṇam?
SA15n1232:117: ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajyākṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kimiyatā pratītiḥ syātra veti |
SA15n1232:120: (2.5) atra pūrvaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ paścād dṛṣṭānta iti kramaniyamo'pi na kaścit |
SA15n1232:124: nahi atatsvabhāvasya bhāve ekāntenānyasya bhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve prayatnānantarīyakatvavat |
SA15n1232:127: tasmādanvayavyatirekayoryathālakṣaṇameko'pi prayokto dvitīyamākṣipatīti naikatraṃ sādhanavākye dvayoḥ prayogaḥ iṣyate vaiyarthyāt |
SA15n1232:130: tadabhāva eva hetorabhāvakhyātiryathā syāt nānyatra vipakṣe viruddhe vā iti niyamakhyāpanārtho'pi vyatirekaprayogo na yuktaḥ ,
SA15n1232:132: (2.7) kathamidam avagamyate sadavaśyaṃ naśvarasvabhāvamiti yena anvayavyatirekasambhava iti cet |
SA15n1232:134: svabhāvata eva bhāvā naśvarāḥ naiṣāṃ svahetubhyo niṣpatrānāmanyato vināśotpattiḥ |
SA15n1232:136: na hi vināśaheturbhāvasya svabhāvameva karoti tasya svahetubhyo nirvṛtteḥ |
SA15n1232:142: bhāvapratiṣedhakaraṇe na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalamiti |
SA15n1232:143: evaṃ ca kartā na bhavatītyakarturahetutvamiti na vināśahetuḥ kaścit |
SA15n1232:145: yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmanyanavasthāyī bhāvaḥ tasya na kiñcinnāśakāraṇaiḥ |
SA15n1232:147: yo hi yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetoreva utpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati,
SA15n1232:150: na hi prakāśādayastadātmāna utpannāḥ punaḥ prakāśādibhāve hetvantaramapekṣante |
SA15n1232:152: tadvadasthitidharmā cet svabhāvato bhāvo niṣpanno na punastadātmatāyāṃ hetvantaramapekṣate |
SA15n1232:160: bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt tatsvabhāvasya paścādiva prāgāpi jananaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1232:162: pūrvabhāvinastu avasthāviśeṣā aṅkurakāraṇasya kāraṇāni iti nānekāntaḥ |
SA15n1232:164: (2.10) yadi te'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti pratyekamiti |
SA15n1232:167: na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā yataḥ ayamasmāsvanyatamo'pi samarthaḥ kimasmābhiḥ kartavyam ityālocyāpare nivarteran |
SA15n1232:170: te samarthāḥ kiṃ nāparāparaṃ janayantīti cet |
SA15n1232:171: na, tatraiva sāmarthyāt tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā nānyasyeti nāparāparajananam |
SA15n1232:172: (2.11) bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhya ekakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāditi cet | na |
SA15n1232:175: yathā mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrā dibhyo bhavato ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍādamṛtsvabhāvebhyo vṛkṣādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāttasyaiva mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthāviśeṣātmatayā tadanyebhyo bhinnaḥ sūtrāttasyaiva mṛtsaṃsthāna viśeṣātmanaḥ cakrādervibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhavati |
SA15n1232:178: na ca tayoḥ śāktiviśeṣaviṣayabhede'pi tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasya kāryasya svabhāvena bhedaḥ mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛdrūpābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1232:179: (2.12) anyadeva saṃsthānaṃ guṇo mṛddravyāt tena bhinnasvabhāvaḥ kulālamṛtpiṇḍayorupayogaviśeṣa iti cet |
SA15n1232:181: api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ kulālaḥ kiṃ na pṛthakkaroti?
SA15n1232:182: guṇasya dravyaparatantratvāt sa kathaṃ pṛthak kriyeta?
SA15n1232:185: tadā kimiti kulālavyāpāramapekṣate iti cet | na |
SA15n1232:188: anyathā mṛtpiṇḍasya svabhāvata eva tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatve vastuna eva prāgapi yogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi |
SA15n1232:189: evaṃ tarthi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavatīti nānayoḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ |
SA15n1232:191: asti tāvadekasvabhāvatve'pi ekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣateti kiṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ekasvabhāvatvasādhanāya atinirbandhena |
SA15n1232:192: (2.13) tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā naikopayogaviṣayāḥ kāryasyaikasvabhāvatve'pi vastuta iti yatheha kāraṇabhedo bhinnaviśeṣopayogāt naikakāryaḥ,
SA15n1232:194: tathā hi- samanantarapratyayādvijñānāccakṣurvijñānasya upalambhātmatā tasyaivopalambhātmanaḥ sataścakṣurindriyādrūpagrahaṇayogyatāpratiniyamaḥ viṣayāttattulyarūpateti abhinnatve'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhvantīti na kāraṇabhede'pi abhedastatkāryaviśeṣasya |
SA15n1232:195: ta evaite kāraṇaśaktibhedā yathāsvaṃ prativiśiṣṭakāryajanane'vyavadheyaśaktitayā pratyupasthitāḥ kṣaṇikatvātsāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśrayaityucyante |
SA15n1232:196: tathāhi tattebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ upalambhātmakaṃ rūpagrahaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ viṣayarūpaṃ ceti prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvamekameva jātam |
SA15n1232:197: (2.14) apratirodhaśaktikeṣu anantarakāryeṣu anādheyaviśeṣeṇu kṣaṇikeṣu pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ?
SA15n1232:198: na vai sarvatrātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā kā tarhi?
SA15n1232:203: tatra ca kṣaṇe ekasya svabhāvasyāvivekād viśeṣasya kartumaśakyatvāt,
SA15n1232:208: te samarthā eva svabhāvato'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti,
SA15n1232:214: kadācidanyathā'pi syuḥ tataścaiko'pi kvacit janayed iti cet |
SA15n1232:215: aparāpara pratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścitsāmyātsarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhitra evaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ |
SA15n1232:217: tatra yo'vyavadhanādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ |
SA15n1232:218: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samarthaḥ teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścātra pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvbhāvino doṣā nopalīyante |
SA15n1232:219: tena yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādihetuḥ sa samarthasya heturiti tatra na kadācidanyathābhāvaḥ |
SA15n1232:220: (2.16) anena nyāyena sarvatra hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamo draṣṭavyaḥ pratikṣaṇamanyānyasvabhāvabhedānvayinīṣu śaktiṣu,
SA15n1232:223: anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet |
SA15n1232:228: kuvindādayaḥ paṭādikriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvatra kurvantīti cet |
SA15n1232:229: krīḍanaśīlo devānāṃ priyaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtamapi punaḥ punaḥ kārayati,
SA15n1232:232: antyāvasthāyāṃ prāgasamarthasya sāmarthyotpattau tasya sāmarthyasya tatsvabhāvatve'pūrvotpattirevasā |
SA15n1232:233: atatsvabhāvatve saḥ akāraka eva sāmarthyākhyātpadārthāntarāt kāryotpattyabhyupagamāt |
SA15n1232:234: (2.17) api ca yo'sau sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu karoti sa tadaiva kasmāt karoti |
SA15n1232:236: aho mahāsāmarthyaṃ mahāprabhāvasya darśanaṃ yasmādatatsvabhāvān api bhāvān svabhāvamātreṇa nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte |
SA15n1232:237: yadi nāma kiñcit kathañcidatrabhavato darśanaviṣayatām atikrāmet,
SA15n1232:238: hanta aprasavadharmakamapetasantānaṃ syaditīyaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti |
SA15n1232:239: na vai vayam atatsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānām asmaddarśanavaśāt kāryakriyāṃ brūmaḥ kintu svabhāvenaiva te kāryakāraṇadharmāḥ ,
SA15n1232:240: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe te ete kārakasvabhāvā iti |
SA15n1232:242: svabhāvasteṣāṃ kāryakriyādharmā tena samastapratyayānāmakṛtvā kāryaṃ nopekṣāpattiriti |
SA15n1232:243: so'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāmutpanna āhosvit prāgapyāsīt?
SA15n1232:245: tatkimidānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca asti?
SA15n1232:246: ko vāsya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ- akṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ca na karotīti |
SA15n1232:247: (2.19) sahitaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ na kevala iti cet |
SA15n1232:250: na hi sa sāhitye'pi pararūpeṇa kartā syāt |
SA15n1232:251: svarūpaṃ ca tasya prāgapi tadeveti kathaṃ kadacit kriyāvirāmaḥ |
SA15n1232:252: yasyāpi bhāvah kṣaṇikaḥ tasyāpi kasmāt kevalo na karoti?
SA15n1232:258: yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ kārakākārakayoḥ svabhāvataddhetvorvirodhāt |
SA15n1232:259: (2.20) yo'pi manyate- akṣepakriyādharmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA15n1232:261: kāryaṃ tu pratyayāntarāpekṣamiti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti,
SA15n1232:262: tasyāpi kathaṃ- sa bhāvaḥ kevalo'pi karotyeva?
SA15n1232:263: kāryaṃ ca tasmātrotpadyate iti tadavastho virodhaḥ |
SA15n1232:268: kāryaṃ cāyaṃ kevalo'pi samarthaḥ san paramapekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta?
SA15n1232:270: evaṃ hi anenātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1232:271: kāryaṃ paramapekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattimasya kathayasi sa kevalo'pi samarthasvabhāva iti tataḥ utpattiṃ brūṣe,
SA15n1232:275: na tu akṣaṇikānāṃ yeṣāṃ pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati pṛthak kāryakaraṇasambhavena sahakāritvaniyamāyogāt |
SA15n1232:276: (2.21) yatra tu santānopakāreṇa bhāvāḥ hetutāṃ pratipadyante,
SA15n1232:278: tatra santānāśrayeṇa viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate na dravyāśrayeṇa,
SA15n1232:280: nahi taṇḍulādīnāṃ viśeṣānutpattau dahanādibhāve'pi odanajanma syāt |
SA15n1232:281: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyeta tadā prāgivārthapratilpattiṃ naiva janayet |
SA15n1232:282: akṣepakāriṣu indriyādiṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati |
SA15n1232:283: tatra yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayairye yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam |
SA15n1232:284: (2.22) yatra tu viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra hetusantānaḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāvāntarasya pratilambhaḥ |
SA15n1232:285: tatra svarasataḥ hetupratyayānāṃ pūrvopanipātakṣaṇānāṃ nivṛttau tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpattirevaṃ krameṇa yāvadatyantātiśayavato'ntyakāraṇakalāpāt kāryotpattiḥ |
SA15n1232:288: tataśca parasparaviśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran |
SA15n1232:293: na ca sahakāriṇaḥ parasparakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane nityaṃ yogyāvasthāḥ,
SA15n1232:296: tenādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya notpadyata iti cet |
SA15n1232:297: nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne'pi kaścidudvego bhavati yadyevamapi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati |
SA15n1232:299: na viśeṣotpādanāt sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ sambhavati |
SA15n1232:301: (2.24) atha kathamekārthakriyā'pi bhavet sāpi na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām |
SA15n1232:304: tathāca, tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlaṃ kāryamapi kevalāt syāditi cet |
SA15n1232:305: atroktamuttaraṃ pratikṣaṇamaparāparaiḥ pratyayaiḥ yathā bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ,
SA15n1232:310: kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca sahakāribhiḥ akṣepakārindriyavijñānavacca kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāditi sarvamuktam |
SA15n1232:311: ( 2.25) tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santānopakārāpekṣakāraṇakāryajanmani sahakāriṇāmādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmā na bhavati,
SA15n1232:313: tataḥ ye viśeṣā jāyante te tajjanmānaḥ tatprakṛtitvāditi nānavasthā |
SA15n1232:317: tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavātkevalo'pi tathā syād ityuktam |
SA15n1232:319: tasmādakṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānām ekārthakriyayā na kaścit sahakāritvaniyamaḥ |
SA15n1232:320: nāpi santatyopakāreṇeti na tasya kaścitsahakārīti kevalo'pi kuryāt |
SA15n1232:321: prāyastu saṃghātasthāyī bhāvasantānaḥ sahakāripratyayairupajanitaviśeṣaḥ svakāryaṃ kurvan dṛṣṭo bījādivat |
SA15n1232:324: (2.26) tasmādyo yadātmā sa svasattāmātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati na bhūtvā tadbhāve parābhisaṃskāramapekṣata iti svabhāvato'sthitidharmaṇo bhāvasya na kiñcitrāśakāraṇaiḥ |
SA15n1232:325: sthitidharmaṇo'pi bhāvasya na nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit svabhāvānyathātvasya kenacit kartumaśakyatvāt |
SA15n1232:326: tadanyathātvapratipattau sa tatsvabhāva eva na syāditi pūrva eva vikalpaḥ syāt |
SA15n1232:328: yaśca parasmādanyathābhāvaḥ so'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ yaścāparaḥ sa kathaṃ tasya syāt?
SA15n1232:330: tathā ca yaḥ sthitidharmā jātaḥ na tasyānyathābhāvaḥ syāt |
SA15n1232:331: etena kaṭhinādīnāṃ tāmrādīnām agnyādeḥ dravatvādisvabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pratyuktā |
SA15n1232:332: tatrāpi pūrvakasya svarasanirodhitvādvināśe 'gnyāderupādānāccāpara eva dravādisvabhāvaḥ utpannaḥ |
SA15n1232:339: prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo bhavatīti ca bruvāṇo bhāvadvayaṃ cāha nityānityasvabhāvabhedam |
SA15n1232:340: prāktanasya nityābhimatasya svabhāvasya svayaṃ nāśaṃ bruvāṇaḥ sarvadaiva nāśamanāśaṃ ca prāheti pūrvasmin vināśaheturasamartha eva |
SA15n1232:345: sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśamanāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo nāma?
SA15n1232:347: tasmāt satyasya vināśe vināśasvabhāvena tena bhavitavyaṃ,
SA15n1232:349: tena svabhāvato naścare'naśvare vā bhāve na vināśahetorupayogaḥ |
SA15n1232:350: (2.28) tasmādvināśaṃ pratyanapekṣo bhāvastadbhāvaniyataḥ iti yaḥ san sa vināśī naśvaratāyā nivṛttau sattvanivṛtirityanvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ |
SA15n1232:352: na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na tatribandhanā'nvayavyatirekāsiddhiriti cet |
SA15n1232:358: itthaṃ ca yat sattat kṣaṇikameveti vyāptisiddhiḥ |
SA15n1232:364: tasmāt kāryaṃ svabhāvairyāvadbhiravinābhāvi kāraṇe teṣāṃ hetuḥ |
SA15n1232:366: taireva ca dharmairye tairvinā na bhavanti |
SA15n1232:368: na, tajjanyaviśeṣagrahaṇe'bhimatatvāt liṅga viśeṣopādhīnāṃ ca sāmānyānām |
SA15n1232:374: tatra yadi dhūmo'gnyādisāmagjyā anyato'pi bhavettadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti sakṛdapi tato na bhavet |
SA15n1232:378: na ca dhūmasya tadatajjanyaḥ svabhāvo yuktaḥ |
SA15n1232:383: tasmādyo dhūmajananaḥ so'gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣo yaḥ agnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa janitaḥ sa eva dhūmo bhavatīti kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ svabhāvasya niyamāt tadvijātīyādutpattirna bhavati |
SA15n1232:384: tadyādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇād dṛṣṭamekadā tattanna vyabhicarati |
SA15n1232:385: tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptiḥ siddhā bhavati |
SA15n1232:386: (3.3) nanu vijātīyādapi kiñcid bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tadyathā go mayādeḥ śālūkādiḥ |
SA15n1232:391: na hi ākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ tattve nimittam,
SA15n1232:393: anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagrayā avilakṣaṇakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ kāryabhedābhedāvityahetukau viśvasya bhedābhedau syātām |
SA15n1232:394: tathā hi na bhedādbheda iti abhedādapi nābhedaḥ |
SA15n1232:395: tadvyatiriktaśca na kaścidbhāvasvabhāva ityahetukatvādbhāvānāṃ nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt |
SA15n1232:402: tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇādapi tasyotpattau na tajjananaśaktipratiniyama iti yat kiñcit yataḥ kutaścitsyāt |
SA15n1232:403: tajjananaśaktisāmye tu tadeveti na kāryaṃ duṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati |
SA15n1232:411: yatra yasmitrupalabhyamāne niyamena yasyopalabdhiḥ bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt satatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ ekajñānasaṃsargāt |
SA15n1232:415: sa kevalastadapekṣayā tadanyaśceducyate tadā tajjñānaṃ tatsvabhāvo vā jñātṛjñeya dharmalakṣaṇā'nupalabdhiḥ |
SA15n1232:418: uktamatra yathā paryudāsavṛttyā'pekṣātaḥ tadvivikto'rthastajjñānaṃ vā'bhāvo'nupalabdhiścocyata iti |
SA15n1232:424: (4.3) sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhistadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam?
SA15n1232:425: kiṃ punarabhāvasya siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ? iti cet |
SA15n1232:428: yatsiddhau yasya na siddhistattasya liṅgaṃ bhavati dhūmāgnivat |
SA15n1232:431: (4.4) sambandhābhāvācca tacca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt,
SA15n1232:433: yathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvena ekārthasamavāyo dhūmasya vā liṅginaikārthasamavāyaḥ |
SA15n1232:435: naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandhaḥ yenāsyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt |
SA15n1232:437: śabdārthayoḥ tatpratipādanābhiprāye sati tatprayogāt kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo'vinābhāvalakṣaṇo vā sambandhaḥ syāt |
SA15n1232:438: ayaṃ cātra na sambhavati yataḥ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt |
SA15n1232:439: siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tanmukhena viṣayaviṣabhibhāvaḥ syāt |
SA15n1232:440: sa eva cāsati sambandhe na sidhyati |
SA15n1232:443: tathā ca ghaṭābhāvastadanyabhāvāt iti ghaṭasya sarvatra sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta |
SA15n1232:444: na, pradeśādirdharmī ghaṭābhāvena viśeṣyata iti tadviśeṣaṇabhūto'bhāvaḥ sādhyate na tu kevalaḥ |
SA15n1232:449: yatraiva hi pradeśādau yatrāstīti ucyate sa eva tenāsaṃsṛṣṭo'nyabhāvaḥ |
SA15n1232:450: taddarśanādevāsya ghaṭo nāsti iti vikalpo bhavati iti kathaṃ tasyaiva liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ?
SA15n1232:451: (4.6) na cātra sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanā sambhavati yena sāmānyaṃ heturbhaved viśeṣo dharmāti,
SA15n1232:454: na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃ tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ |
SA15n1232:455: tādṛśe kevale pradeśe sarvatrābhāva iti cet |
SA15n1232:457: sa ca tatpratipattāveva siddha iti kasya idānīṃ talliṅgam?
SA15n1232:460: (4.7) asti virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ tato'nyabhāvādabhāvasya siddhiḥ iti cet |
SA15n1232:461: kena kasya virodho'nyabhāvena pratiyoginaḥ kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭo yena liṅgaliṅganorvirodhaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt?
SA15n1232:466: (4.8) nanu anyabhāvatadabhāvayorasati sambandhe'nyabhāvagatyāpi tadabhāvagatirna syāditi cet |
SA15n1232:467: na vai kutaścit sambandhādanyabhāvastadabhāvagamaka iṣṭaḥ kintu anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo yathoktaṃ prāk |
SA15n1232:468: tasyānyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya kevalasyaikātmavyasthitasya tadātmanā pariccedasyaivānyavyavaccedatvāt tasya kaivalyamevāparasya vaikalyamiti tadanyabhāva eva tadabhāvaḥ |
SA15n1232:470: anyathā tasya pariccedena tato'nyasya avyavaccede tatparicceda eva na syāt |
SA15n1232:472: ya eva vyavahāraḥ kasyacitkvaceddeśe darśanāt prāptiparihārārthaḥ sa na syāt |
SA15n1232:473: na hyayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi kevalam analameva paśyatīti kathaṃ salilārthī tatra na praverteta?
SA15n1232:476: yadi salilopalambhābhāvaḥ tadā kathamabhāvaḥ kasyacitpratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā?
SA15n1232:478: tasya tato vā'nyasya kasyacidapyapratipattāvapi yadyabhāvaḥ pratīyate tadā svāpamadamūrccāvyavadhānapṛṣṭhībhāvādyavasthāsvapi kiṃ na pratīyate?
SA15n1232:480: tasmādayamanalaṃ paśyatrapi analo'yaṃ salilam iti nādhyavasyatīti na tiṣṭhetrāpi pratiṣṭheta |
SA15n1232:482: ( 4.9) tata evaikasya darśanād anyābhāvagatiścet kathamekaṃ dṛṣṭamanyatrāstīti pratyāyayati?
SA15n1232:485: tasmāttīrādarśineva śakuninā dūraparyaṭayāpi pratyāgantavyamityalam avidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ pratipattyā |
SA15n1232:486: (4. 10) yadyekapariccedādevānyavyavaccedaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyānyasya aviśeṣeṇa tatrābhāvasiddhirbhavet |
SA15n1232:490: (4.11) ekātmapariccedāt tasya tadanyātmavyavaccedo bhavati tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānāt na hi tadātmā tadanyasyātmā bhavati |
SA15n1232:491: anyātmāvyavaccede pravṛttinivṛttyoḥ abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ |
SA15n1232:492: taṃ ca deśakālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadātmanopalabhamānā buddhiḥ tathātvapracyutimasya vyavaccinati |
SA15n1232:494: yadi anyathābhāvo vyavaccinno bhavatiḥ tathātvaṃ ca tasyaiva bhavati nānyasyeti anyathābhūtāttathābhūtaṃ vyavaccindatyeva tat pariccinati |
SA15n1232:498: tasya tadanyatayā vyāptyabhāve tena tadarthāvyavaccedātpunarapi bhāvasyāpariccedaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1232:501: tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ ca sūcayati iti ekapramāṇavyāpāra eṣaḥ |
SA15n1232:502: tathāhi kvacitpramāṇaṃ pravṛtaṃ tadeva tadanyasmād vyavaccinattī,
SA15n1232:504: tadanyadeva ca tasmād vyavaccinatti anyasya tatra apariccedāt |
SA15n1232:514: (4.13) anyabhāvaviṣayasyopalabdhirapi tadabhāvasya sādhikeṣṭaiva na tu liṅgatvena |
SA15n1232:517: na hi anyasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya tatpratipatteḥ anvayavyatirekau prasādhya tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate |
SA15n1232:518: kiṃ tarhi? tadanyaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate |
SA15n1232:519: darśanānantaram idamasti idaṃ tu nāsti iti vyavasthāpanāt |
SA15n1232:520: tacca tasya liṅgaṃ bhavati yasyānvayi vyatireko ca |
SA15n1232:522: na hi evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anyabhāvopalabdhistatra tadabhāvaḥ iti |
SA15n1232:525: kiṃtu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya sādhiketi anavasthā dṛṣṭāntānāmityapratipattiḥ |
SA15n1232:527: so'nyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇenānupalambhena siddhaḥ san mūḍhapratipattāvabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed iti alaṃ prasaṅgena |
SA15n1232:532: sa tathā siddhaḥ san kāryavyāpyayorabhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati |
SA15n1232:533: svabhāvānupalabdhau tu anupalabdhyā liṅgabhūtayā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate |
SA15n1232:534: (4.15) yadi kāraṇavyāpakau tadanyabhāvasiddhayā'nupalabdhyā siddhāsad vyavahārāvanyasyābhāvamabhāvavyavahāṃra ca sādhayataḥ |
SA15n1232:535: sā ca tayorupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāvevāsadvyavahārasya sādhiketi kathaṃ tayoḥ parokṣe'rtheprayogaḥ?
SA15n1232:538: kevalaṃ kāraṇavyāpakayorhi siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvaḥ parasyāpi avaśyamabhāvaḥ iti etasya darśanārthamete prayujyete iti |
SA15n1232:539: eṣa eva pakṣadharmo'nvayavyatirekavān iti tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturgamakaḥ svaśādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt |
SA15n1232:541: trīṇi caitāni abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ jñātatvaṃ ceti |
SA15n1232:542: tatrābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15n1232:544: avinābhāvo hi satyeva sādhyadharme bhāvo hetoḥ |
SA15n1232:545: sa hetustallakṣaṇaḥ dharmiṇi syād atra ca sādhyadharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet?
SA15n1232:546: pratyakṣānumāne hi sādhyadharmaṃ bādhamāne taṃ dharmiṇo niṣkāsayataḥ tasmiṃśca satyeva heturbhavan taṃ tatraivāvasthāpayatīti paraṃ bata bhāvānāmasvāsthyam |
SA15n1232:547: anyatra sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇeveti cet |
SA15n1232:548: tat kimayaṃ tapasvī śaṇḍhamudvāhya putraṃ mṛgayate?
SA15n1232:552: syādetad, yata eva heturanyathā'pi bhavedata eva pramāṇābhyāmabādhitadharmā dharmītyucyata iti |
SA15n1232:555: bādhāyāmapi sādhyābhāvasya tena sādhanāt kutaḥ sādhanasya sāmarthyam |
SA15n1232:557: bādhakapramāṇasyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāvasya ca saṃbhavaḥ syāditi na sāmarthyamabādhāyāḥ |
SA15n1232:559: kiṃ tarhi? bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādhāyāḥ saṃbhave'pi syāditi sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ |
SA15n1232:560: kiṃ nu vai heturbādhopalabdherbibheti na punarbādhāyā yena bādhāmanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ?
SA15n1232:561: sa tarhi paramārthena-'bādhā kimasti nāsti' ityanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ?
SA15n1232:564: sa kiṃ kvacit satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayed yenāsyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca pratyujyate |
SA15n1232:565: evaṃ ca sati abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati |
SA15n1232:568: yathā ca bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi prayujyatām,
SA15n1232:570: (5.4) na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiti cet |
SA15n1232:579: upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi bādhāyā anivṛttau tadavasthaṃ hetorasāmarthyamityaprayogaḥ |
SA15n1232:580: tasmāt svasādhyabhāvābhāvādhyāmanyathāpi bhavanhetuḥ dharmiṇi na kiñcidbhāvayati na vibhāvayati iti tadupakṣepo na samarthaḥ |
SA15n1232:583: (5.5) tatrāma tasmād viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ bhavet lakṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati yasya bhāve'pi yasya aparasyābhāvaḥ syāt |
SA15n1232:584: tadyathā pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti |
SA15n1232:585: n acaitad abādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati iti na sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvinorhetuviruddhayorviṣaye bādhā saṃbhavati iti na tadabhāvaḥ pṛthaganayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ |
SA15n1232:586: tasmād hetoḥ prayoge pratijñādoṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavo nāsti |
SA15n1232:590: katham? eko hi hetuḥ svasādhyabhāva eva bhavediti tatrāvyabhicārī tatraiva tasmādanyo'pi kathaṃ heturbhavati?
SA15n1232:591: ekasya yat sādhyaṃ tadabādhakasya dharmasya bhāva eva bhāvāditi bādhayā samānam |
SA15n1232:592: (5.7) api ca | kiṃ yo vastuto'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānasya viparyayasya vā heturiṣṭa āhosvidapradarśitapratihetuḥ? kiṃ cātaḥ?
SA15n1232:594: na hi aniścitātmanaḥ pratipādakadharmasya tallakṣaṇatvaṃ yathā sandigdhasya pakṣadharmatvasya |
SA15n1232:595: nāpi sandigdhalakṣaṇo heturbhavediti na kaścid heturbhavet |
SA15n1232:596: tulye lakṣaṇe di dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ saṃbhavo'dṛṣṭapratiyogiṣu api śaṃkāmutpādayati viśeṣābhāvāt |
SA15n1232:597: sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam |
SA15n1232:598: yatastadviśeṣād heturekāntena nirastapratipakṣaḥ svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti atallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt tathā ca vyarthā ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā |
SA15n1232:599: ato viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇaṃ hīyeta svalakṣaṇayuktayorhetvorekatra dharmiṇi virodhenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārī iti |
SA15n1232:600: (5.8) na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ,
SA15n1232:602: tasmātrāstyevaṃ viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā bhavitavyam |
SA15n1232:603: dṛṣṭapratihetorapi hetoḥ prāgitareṇa na kaścidviśeṣo lakṣyate |
SA15n1232:609: “yadā tarhi śabdatvaṃ nityamabhyupagaccati tadāyaṃ hetureva syād yadyatra anityatvahetuṃ kṛtakatvādi kaścitra darśayed “ iti |
SA15n1232:611: nyāyamanupālayadbhirasaṃvaraṇīyamiti kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta?
SA15n1232:612: sa tāvadayaṃ hetuḥ vastūni svasādhyaprakṛtīni kṛtvā tatpramāṇakān puruṣān abhyudayaniḥ śreyasābhyāṃ yojayitvā punaśca pratibhāvatā puruṣeṇa hetvantaranidarśanena utkīlitasādhanasāmarthyaḥ tāni vastūni tadbhāvasampadastāṃśca puruṣān abhyudayaniḥ śreyasasampadaḥ pracyāvya bhraṣṭarājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gaccatīti kimatra brūmaḥ |
SA15n1232:613: (5.10) puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ hi yadi sādhanatvaṃ syāt tadā na kiñcit sādhanamasādhanaṃ vā |
SA15n1232:614: sa ca heturyadi svabhāvatastaddharmabhāvī tadā kathamanyathā kriyeta?
SA15n1232:620: (5.11) jñānaṃ punarna liṅgasyātmarūpamiti kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
SA15n1232:621: kiṃrūpād hetoranumeyo'rtho jñātavya iti cintāyāṃ pratipatturavisaṃvādakalingasvarūpamabhidhīyate yasya darśanād ayaṃ pravibhāgena sādhanaṃ vyavasthāpya tasyeṣṭārthasaṃnidhānasaṃpratyayāt pravṛttimavalambate |
SA15n1232:622: tathā yadasyātmarūpaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ na tu pararūpam |
SA15n1232:623: pratipattijanmani upayogamātrāt tallakṣaṇatve prameyapuruṣādīnāmapi tallakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet |
SA15n1232:624: na hi teṣvapi asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1232:627: sapakṣavipakṣayordarśanādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetumiccatāṃ naiva samartho heturbhavati satorapi darśanādarśanayoragamakatvadarśanāt |
SA15n1232:628: tena bhāvābhāvābhyāmeva gamako heturiti jñāpanārtha niścitagrahaṇam |
SA15n1232:629: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15n1232:635: jñānasattānibandhanatvājjñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ iti sarvatra jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva tatsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākarṣatiḥ parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasyaḥ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ saṃvādakamiti tadrūpamapratipattṛṇāṃ tataḥ pravṛttirna bhavatīti paropalakṣaṇātvādeva pravartake jñānaṃ siddhamḥ tathāpi tāveva viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvau kecid darśanādarśanamātreṇa vyavasthāpayantīti teṣāṃ niṣedhārtho'yaṃ niścitaśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ |
SA15n1232:637: tasmāt pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva bhāvābhāvau sidhyata iti vipratipattinirāsārthamasmābhirniścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam |
SA15n1232:646: ekaṃ vākyamubhayaṃ gamayatītyucyate naiko'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyeti |
SA15n1232:647: nanu tatraiva bhāva ityatra tadarthatayā tadabhāve'bhāvo gamyate,
SA15n1232:648: atadbhāve'vaśyamabhāva ityatra ca tadbhāve bhāva iti parasparākṣepa iti cet |
SA15n1232:654: (5.15) tasmāt tatraiva bhāva iti na bhāva evocyate itareṇāpi nā bhāva eva yena bhāvo'bhāvo vā dvitīyamākṣipet |
